content:
@Grahame Grieve or @Lloyd McKenzie I am following up on behalf of Emma, I think this tracker should be Git issues? FHIR-34180. I have created a detailed issue here https://github.com/HL7/fhir-ig-publisher/issues/338
Can she withdraw those trackers (she logged three )? and how far down on your list will this be? 2022 Q1,2?
the issue appears to be in the underlying the specification, so I don't know why you created a git issue for that
Eric Haas has marked this topic as resolved.
